parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Host Name
parameter.description: The host name of the server.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: User Name
parameter.description: The username to connect to the server.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The password to connect to the server.

parameter.name: telemetryPollTime
parameter.label: Telemetry Poll Delay
parameter.description: How often to request telemetry data. Enter 0 to disable.

parameter.name: alarmPollTime
parameter.label: Alarm Poll Delay
parameter.description: How often to request alarm data. Enter 0 to disable.

parameter.name: commandPollDelay
parameter.label: Command Poll Delay
parameter.description: Delay to poll server after a command. This allows time for the command to propagate to the Omnilogic and back to the cloud server. If items toggle after a command, increase the delay. Enter 0 to disable/suppress all outgoing commands.
